entry.string: The var/cache/output directory must be writable by the web server for output caching to work. The xarCacheManager module has not been installed, please make the var/cache/output directory writable by the web server before re-trying to install this module.
entry.translation: Zee var/cache/output durectury moost be-a vreeteble-a by zee veb serfer fur ooootpoot cecheeng tu vurk. Zee xerCecheMuneger mudoole-a hes nut beee instelled, pleese-a meke-a zee var/cache/output durectury vreeteble-a by zee veb serfer beffure-a re-a-tryeeng tu instell thees mudoole-a.

entry.string: The var/cache directory must be writable by the web server for the install script to set up output caching for you. The xarCacheManager module has not been installed, please make the var/cache directory writable by the web server before re-trying to install this module. Alternatively, you can manually create the var/cache/output directory and copy the xarcachemanager/config.caching.php.dist file to var/cache/config.caching.php - the output directory and the config.caching.php file must be writable by the web server for output caching to work.
entry.translation: Zee var/cache durectury moost be-a vreeteble-a by zee veb serfer fur zee instell screept tu set up ooootpoot cecheeng fur yuu. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp! Zee xerCecheMuneger mudoole-a hes nut beee instelled, pleese-a meke-a zee var/cachedurectury vreeteble-a by zee veb serfer beffure-a re-a-tryeeng tu instell thees mudoole-a. Elterneteefely, yuoo cun munooelly creete-a zee var/cache/output durectury und cupy zee xarcachemanager/config.caching.php.dist feele-a tu var/cache/config.caching.php - zee ooootpoot durectury und zee cunffeeg.cecheeng.php feele-a moost be-a vreeteble-a by zee veb serfer fur ooootpoot cecheeng tu vurk.

entry.string: That is strange. The default, distributed configuration file, normally #(1), seems to be missing.
entry.translation: Thet is stronge-a. Zee deffoolt, deestribooted cunffeegooreshun feele-a, nurmelly #(1), seems tu be-a meessing.

entry.string: The var/cache directory must be writable by the web server for the install script to set up output caching for you. The xarCacheManager module has not been installed, please make the var/cache directory writable by the web server before re-trying to install this module. Alternatively, you can manually copy the xarcachemanager/config.caching.php.dist file to var/cache/config.caching.php - the config.caching.php file must be writable by the web server for output caching to be managed with the xarcachemanager module.
entry.translation: Zee var/cache durectury moost be-a vreeteble-a by zee veb serfer fur zee instell screept tu set up ooootpoot cecheeng fur yuu. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp! Zee xerCecheMuneger mudoole-a hes nut beee instelled, pleese-a meke-a var/cache durectury vreeteble-a by zee veb serfer beffure-a re-a-tryeeng tu instell thees mudoole-a. Elterneteefely, yuoo cun munooelly cupy zee xarcachemanager/config.caching.php.dist feele-a tu var/cache/config.caching.php - zee config.caching.php feele-a moost be-a vreeteble-a by zee veb serfer fur ooootpoot cecheeng tu be-a muneged veet zee xercechemuneger mudoole-a.

entry.string: The xarCacheManager module upgrade has failed. Please make #(1) writable by the web server process owner to complete the upgrade. If #(1) does not exist, please make #(2) writable by the web server process and #(1) will be created for you.
entry.translation: Zee xerCecheMuneger mudoole-a upgrede-a hes feeeled. Bork bork bork! Pleese-a meke-a #(1) vreeteble-a by zee veb serfer prucess oovner tu cumplete-a zee upgrede-a. Iff #(1) dues nut ixeest, pleese-a meke-a #(2) vreeteble-a by zee veb serfer prucess und #(1) veell be-a creeted fur yuu. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: The xarCacheManager module upgrade has failed. The #(1) directory is missing, and the #(2) is not writable by the web server process owner. Please make #(2) writable by the web server process owner to complete the upgrade. Alternatively, the #(1) directory can be manually created. #(1) must be writable by the web service process owner for output caching to work.
entry.translation: Zee xerCecheMuneger mudoole-a upgrede-a hes feeeled. Bork bork bork! Zee #(1) durectury is meessing, und zee #(2) is nut vreeteble-a by zee veb serfer prucess oovner. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp! Pleese-a meke-a #(2) vreeteble-a by zee veb serfer prucess oovner tu cumplete-a zee upgrede-a. Elterneteefely, zee #(1) durectury cun be-a munooelly creeted. Bork bork bork! #(1) moost be-a vreeteble-a by zee veb serfeece-a prucess oovner fur ooootpoot cecheeng tu vurk.
